name: Magnetic Socket Organizer Set, 6-piece 1/4", 3/8", 1/2" SAE & Metric Socket Holder, Drive Socket Trays, Storage Tool Box, Holding 143 Slots, Soft Rubber Covering Black Green Tools
short_description: Made of heavy duty molded ABS plastic.Fit total 143pcs shallow and deep sockets，Metric and SAE sockets.
Includes 3pcs black metric magnetic socket organizers and 3pcs green SAE magnetic socket organizers for 1/4", 3/8", and 1/2" drives.
The magnetic base secures the sockets in their designated places. It won't fall out .and the rubber-made surface wont scratch metal tools and sockets.
Each socket organizer tray mark with a legible label,easy to pick.
An effective way to organize cluttered toolboxes and work areas.

name: Magnetic Socket Holder Organizer Set: 6-Piece Detachable 1/2 3/8 1/4 Drive Sockets Storage Tray Magnetic Socket Organizer Tool Box Drawer Tool Box Organizers Storage Metric SAE (Sockets Not Included)
short_description: DURABLE & DETACHABLE - Crafted from high-impact material with powerful magnet power, this portable socket holder is temperature-resistant and easily detachable for versatile placement.
MAGNETIC GRIP - Secure sockets firmly with the magnetic base; confidently access tools without sockets falling, enhancing your toolbox organization and wrench storage.
LARGE CAPACITY - Store 141 metric & SAE sockets efficiently; includes blue metric and red SAE trays for 1/4", 3/8", and 1/2" drives.
PROTECTIVE DESIGN - The magnetic socket holder, made of scratch-resistant soft magnet materials, optimizes socket storage while protecting both tools and surfaces.
EXTRA UTILITY - Benefit from the detachable design, easily portable; each organizer includes a magnetic parts tray for additional items like nuts and bolts.

name: WORKPRO 8-Piece Magnetic Socket Organizer and Magnetic Wrench Organizer Set, 1/4", 3/8", 1/2" Drive Metric SAE Aluminum Alloy Socket Rail, Metric SAE Wrench Holder(Socket, Wrench not Included)
short_description: Strong Magnetic Hold: The magnetic base keeps sockets and wrenches firmly in place—even when the tray is turned upside down. Easily attach to any steel surface like toolboxes, pegboard, or workbenches for secure, convenient storage

Large Capacity of Socket Organizers: The 6-Piece socket organizer set has a length of 13.2 inches and comes with 1/4-inch x 12 clips, 3/8-inch x 10 clips, and 1/2-inch x 10 clips. Aluminum socket rails have proper grooves in the surface for smooth sliding of the clips

Large Capacity for Wrenches: Each wrench organizer holds up to 12 wrenches, with the two-piece set storing a total of 24. Designed to fit both stubby and line wrenches, it keeps your tools neatly arranged and easily accessible

Heavy Duty Construction: Built to last, WORKPRO organizer set combines rugged aluminum socket rails with sturdy, high-impact plastic wrench racks. The aluminum rails resist bending and corrosion, while the sturdy plastic holders provide long-term strength without warping or cracking—perfect for both pros and DIYers

Efficient Organization and Storage: Easily organize your tools and maximize space in your garage or workshop. This set keeps your sockets and wrenches neatly arranged, so you can quickly find the right size when needed. Each socket rail features a hanging hole for convenient wall-mounted storage (socket and wrench not included)

name: ARES 60077-3-Piece 1/4-Inch Drive 9.84-Inch Aluminum Socket Rail Set - Includes Red, Blue, and Black Rails - Each Aluminum Rail Stores up to 10 Sockets
short_description: ITEM SPECIFICATIONS: These light, portable metal socket organizers are 9.84 inches long, made of extruded aluminum and come in 1/4-inch, 3/8-inch, and 1/2-inch drive. Each rail holds 10 metric or SAE sockets, and the socket clips have spring-loaded detent balls to firmly hold sockets in place, even upside down. **Sockets are not included**

VERSATILITY: Every ARES socket rail is fully customizable, with removable end caps to allow for easier clip changes, in addition to being wall-mount ready. Whether you plan on using an ARES socket organizer to assemble a socket set that will travel with you effortlessly or just want a way to keep your tool box more organized, these socket organizers have you covered.

INTERCHANGEABLE: Our patented spring-loaded detent ball socket clips glide over any of the aluminum rails, allowing you to mix and match your sets as you please. If you want to put a few 1/4-inch sockets on your 1/2-inch socket organizer, you can. For additional 1/4-inch, 3/8-inch, and 1/2-inch drive clip sets, see ARES 70081, 70082, 70083, 60050, 60051, and 60052.

RELIABLE | EFFECTIVE | EFFICIENT: Users trust ARES to be quality tools. You are backed by our Performance Assurance Limited Lifetime Warranty. If you have any issues with your ARES Socket Organizer Set, simply contact customer service for troubleshooting help, parts, replacement, or refund.

ASPCA BUSINESS AMBASSADOR: We are proud to be part of the ASPCA Business Ambassador Program. If you have a pet, you realize they are more than a pet, they are part of the family. With your support, we’re proud to help this great organization.

name: Neiko 03969A Socket Holder Rail, 3 Piece Organizer Set | 1/4, 3/8 and 1/2-Inch Drive
short_description: [DURABLE] Nickel plated steel clips and rails are made durable to withstand long-term holding use versus plastic holders
[LIGHTWEIGHT] Socket holders are lightweight so you can transport sockets with ease
[EASY STORAGE] Hole for loops are located on both ends of each socket holder and in the middle so you can easily hang on the garage and workshop walls
[PRECISION DESIGN] Curved clip design securely holds sockets with enough tension without making removing too difficult
[VERSATILE SIZES] Each socket rail has 16 drive clips. Each rail accommodates a different drive size: 1/4", 3/8” and 1/2" drive, making separation and organization easier.
product_description: The Neiko Socket Rail Set comes with three socket holders with 16 rails each. Each socket holder respectively holds the following drive sizes: 1/4, 3/8 and 1/2-inch drives.

name: Ernst Manufacturing 8487 Socket Boss, 2 18-Inch Rails featuring Twist-Lock Secure Socket Holder and Drawer Tray, Fits 1/2 Inch Drive Sockets, Green - Made in USA
short_description: Socket Holders feature patented Twist-Lock clips that keep sockets secured for transport and prevent tool loss — even when turned upside down - (Patent No.: US 8,770,418 B2 )
Socket holder holds up to 34 sockets and socket accessories - for use with standard 1/2 Inch drive sockets.
Socket rails are locked in socket organizer tray for security and unlock with the push of a button. Suitable for portable or stationary tool chests.
Tool socket organizer tray measures 19.75 inches long by 5.3 inches wide and 1.35 inches deep. Socket rails measure 18 inches.
Professional mechanic and automotive industry grade toolbox socket organizer with a lifetime guarantee. Made in the USA.
product_description: Capitalize on maximum configuration possibilities with the new Socket Boss Universal Twist-Lock Socket Tray from Ernst Manufacturing. Versatility is a must for organizing any socket set. Individual rails can be removed or switched for customization. Add or remove socket clips, label socket sizes with I.D. stickers, trade colors, swap out drive sizes, add ratchet and extension holders, the options are limitless for organizing your own set of sockets. Perfect for storage in the drawer, on the bench, or on the go. This compact set fits a large set of tools using a small amount of storage space. Easy to grab and go with handles on each end. Twist-Lock clips keep sockets secured for transport and prevent tool loss. Even upside down sockets are locked in tight. Socket rails are locked in the tray for security and unlock with the push of a button. The full length of an 18 inch rail can be loaded with sockets. We recommended red for SAE and blue for Metric Includes: one socket tray, two universal socket rails and 34 - 1/2-inch drive twist-lock socket clips. Made in USA. Measures 19.75 Inch by 3.63 Inch by 1.35 Inch. Patents US 6,637,605, US 8,770,418, US 9,364,949, D725,993S

name: 9-Piece Socket Organizer Set,1/2 inch, 3/8 inch and 1/4 inch Drive Socket Rail Holders, Premium Quality ABS Socket Drive Racks with 129 Clips
short_description: 【Socket Organizer Solution】Socpuro 9-Piece socket organizer tary set can help you instantly manage cluttered sockets. Great for organizing sockets for tool boxes, mechanical repairs, tool rooms and more!
【High-Quality Material】Crafted from high-quality ABS material, this socket organizer is built to withstand daily wear and tear, providing you with a reliable storage solution.

【Large Capacity & Efficient】9Pcs socket rail holder includes 129 ABS spring clips in 3 colors. (1/4 in. x 48 clips, 3/8 in. x 45 clips and 1/2 in. x 36 clips). Can hold both deep and shallow sockets in SAE (inch) and metric sizes, ensuring your tools are always neatly organized and easily accessible.

【Secure and Convenient】Features a unique ball-bearing design that keeps your sockets firmly in place, preventing any accidental falls or slips. DIY Needs- Easily disassemble the end caps to add or remove clips so that we can put multiple sizes on a single rail.
【Space-saving and Versatile】Easily mounted on the wall or stored in a tool pouch, this socket organizer racks offers versatile storage options to save space and increase your workspace efficiency.

name: HORUSDY 3Pcs Double Sided Socket Organizer, 1/4-Inch, 3/8-Inch, 1/2-Inch, Premium Quality Socket Holders
short_description: Heavy Duty Molded ABS Plastic Allows For Shallow Or Deep Sockets
Brilliant Red, Blue And Orange Colors Make Identifying Between Drive Sizes Fast And Easy
Spring Loaded Ball Bearings On Each Clip Hold Sockets Firm And Secure
A Quick And Easy Way To Organize Cluttered Toolboxes And Work Areas
Works With All Brands Of Sockets Like Snap-On, Craftsman, Mac, And Matco Just To Name A Few

name: 3 PCS Double Sided Socket Organizer, 1/2" 3/8" 1/4" ABS Drive Socket Rail Holder Set, Heavy Duty Double Sided Socket Storage Rail Rack, Premium Quality Socket Holder Kit
short_description: 【Practical Function】: The double-sided socket organizer is designed to keep your tools neat and organized, significantly reducing clutter in your workspace or toolbox. Thanks to the efficient layout, you can easily find and access the sockets you need, making your workflow smoother.

【Durable Construction】: These socket storage rail holders feature a sturdy iron base that will not bend or warp. Besides, the accompanying ABS plastic clips are equally resilient, standing up to long-term use without cracking or breaking. Together, they provide long-lasting storage solutions for your sockets.

【Secure Holding】: Each clip of the organizer is quipped with spring-loaded ball bearings that hold sockets firmly in place. Such a secure retention mechanism can keep sockets away from falling out or getting lost, making sure that your tools are always organized and readily accessible.

【Size Information】: The set includes three organizers in vibrant red, blue, and orange, each designed for a specific drive size: 1/2", 3/8" and 1/4", respectively. Although the clips suit different socket sizes, all the bases remain consistent at 11.0" by 1.0", ensuring a uniform and organized storage system.

【Wide Compatibility】: The heavy-duty socket holders work seamlessly with a wide range of socket makes. Whether you have standard, deep, or impact sockets, you can confidently store your sockets on these holders, accommodating various brands without any concerns.

name: Tandefio 15 Pcs Metal Socket Rails Set Socket Organizer Holder 16 Clip on Rail Tool Organizer Storage, 1/4-inch, 3/8-inch, 1/2-inch

Easy to Hang: both ends and center of the metal socket holders tool rack have ring holes that can be easily hung on the wall for easy access, ideal for garages and workshops where priority is given to power tools and drill bits, it also adds security to your work environment

Safe and Easy to Use: the socket rails organizer design is simple, easy to install, no need for complex tools, ARC clamp design can be firmly fixed socket, and has enough tension, without making it too difficult to disassemble, easy to install and disassemble
